Interface MessageFormattingStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiLineFormat, SingleLineFormat

    public interface MessageFormattingStrategy
    Since:
    09/2013
    Author:
    Quinton McCombs

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String formatMessage(int connectionId, String now, long elapsed, String category, String prepared, String sql)
      Formats a log message for the logging module

    • Method Detail

      • formatMessage

        String formatMessage(int connectionId,
                   String now,
                   long elapsed,
                   String category,
                   String prepared,
                   String sql)
        Formats a log message for the logging module
        Parameters:
        connectionId - the id of the connection
        now - the current ime expressing in milliseconds
        elapsed - the time in milliseconds that the operation took to complete
        category - the category of the operation
        prepared - the SQL statement with all bind variables replaced with actual values
        sql - the sql statement executed
        Returns:
        the formatted log message
